name: winst-internship-portal
description: Full-stack internship management portal with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL - Complete with Assessments, Referrals, Affiliates, and Task Submissions

scripts.predeploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules admin-portal/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json admin-portal/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd admin-portal && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin-portal && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd admin-portal && npm run build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run preview" "cd admin-portal && npm run preview"
scripts.serve:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview" "cd admin-portal && npm run preview"
scripts.start: npm run setup-db && npm run install-all && npm run dev
scripts.start-fresh: npm run setup-db-fresh && npm run install-all && npm run dev
scripts.verify-requirements: node -e "console.log('ðŸ” Verifying all 4 requirements are implemented...'); require('./verify-requirements.js')"
